Interface SeatServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SeatService

    public interface SeatServiceInterface
    Author:
    pviswanathan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Seat> getSeats(int showId, SeatHoldStatus seatHoldStatus)
      Get all the Seats for the show based on the SeatHoldStatus in the request
      UUID holdSeats(int numberOfSeatsToBeHeld, int showId, String emailAddress)
      holds the requested number of seats in the show
      Boolean reserveSeats(UUID seatHoldId, int showId)
      reserves the seats in a specific seat hold transaction

    • Method Detail

      • getSeats

        List<Seat> getSeats(int showId,
                    SeatHoldStatus seatHoldStatus)
        Get all the Seats for the show based on the SeatHoldStatus in the request
        Parameters:
        showId - Unique Identifier of the show
        seatHoldStatus - Seat hold Status - AVAILABLE / HELD / RESERVED
        Returns:

      • holdSeats

        UUID holdSeats(int numberOfSeatsToBeHeld,
               int showId,
               String emailAddress)
        holds the requested number of seats in the show
        Parameters:
        numberOfSeatsToBeHeld - number of seats to be held
        showId - Unique Identifier of the show
        emailAddress - email Address of the reservation
        Returns:
        Unique Identifier for the seat hold transaction

      • reserveSeats

        Boolean reserveSeats(UUID seatHoldId,
                     int showId)
        reserves the seats in a specific seat hold transaction
        Parameters:
        seatHoldId - Unique Identifier for the seat hold transaction
        showId - Unique Identifier of the show
        Returns:
        true/false based on the reservation was successful or not
